Text: Thank YouSusan Scott We hope that your visits to our web site wwwmedhelporg have been helpful and that you were able to obtain useful information from our libraries and our Ask the Doctor forums Addiction Child Behavioral Health Dermatology Heart Gastroenterology Hepatitis Mental Health Neurology Urology Did you know that it costs us as much as for questions that are answered in these forums Within the past six years Med Help International a nonprofit organization has become one of the worlds largest sources for consumer health information Our site regularly receives more than million hits per month Right now we need a little help from friends like you in order to continue our services and hopefully expand them Med Help does not receive government funding or foundation grants we rely upon donations from people like you We want to always be here for you If you are in a position to make even a small donation we sure can use your support All contributions are tax deductible and may be mailed to Med Help International South Highway AA Suite C PMB Melbourne Beach Florida Best Regards Cindy and Phil Founders Med Help International PS For tax purposes if you need our nonprofit ID number please send us your request via email to and we will send our Federal ID to you PPS This is a one time mailer if you want to be permanently removed from our database send email to
